entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @WashTimes In bizarre turn of events 80 year old @SpeakerPelosi was rushed to the #KennedyCenter after testing positive for #COVID19 #coronavirus to be treated by retired diverse community newspaper journalists because that is where she sent the funding #PelosiHatesAmericans
